short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes Teams requests to turn on desktop notifications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When using Microsoft Teams in Chrome, the app asks every time you start it if you want desktop notifications on. I find these notifications distracting, so I will never turn them on, ever.

So I have to close this alert every time I start Teams, which has really gotten on my nerves. So I wrote this extension to remove the message asking for these to be turned on.
